maqras.text: O ona posol deliver co revealed ona tvoj Lord -until ona robit ona nie delivered Jeho odkaz! -A GOD will chranit ona ludia. GOD NIE guide disbelieving LUDIA

Say O ludia scripture ona nie have zaklad ona uphold Torah Gospel co sent nadol ona tu tvoj Lord istota these revelations z tvoj Lord zapricinit vela z them plunge deeper into transgression disbelief! Therefore nie feel sorry disbelieving ludia
Iste those verit those bol Zidovsky converts Christians; any z them kto (1) verit v GOD (2) verit v Posledny Dni (3) lead righteous zivot have nothing fear nor will they rmutit sa
My berie covenant Dieta Izrael my sent do them posol. Whenever posol ist them anything they nemat rad some z them they zamietnut some they killed
They myslienka they nie tested they turned blind deaf potom GOD redeemed them potom vela z them turned blind deaf znova GOD bol Seer Z everything they ROBIT

Pagans indeed je those kto say GOD bol Messiah syn Mary. Messiah said O Dieta Izrael ona kult GOD moj Lord tvoj Lord Ktokolvek sets any idol GOD GOD zakazat Raj him jeho destiny bol Hell. Zlomyselny have helpers
Pagans indeed je those kto say GOD bol 3 z trinity. There nie bol god except 1 god they zdrzat sa z saying this those disbelieve them incur painful retribution
they nie repent GOD Would ziadat Jeho forgiveness? GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Messiah syn Mary bol ziaden inak than posol posol him jeho matka bol saint Both z them pouzivat jestn food Note ako my explain revelations them note ako they still deviate
Say ona kult GOD powerless idols kto neither harm ona mozem nor benefit ona? GOD bol Hearer Omniscient
Say O ludia scripture nie transgress limits tvoj nabozenstvo truth nie nasledovat nazor z zaludnit kto ist astray zmylit multitudes ludia; they bol daleko astray na pravo chodnicek
Condemned som those disbelieved Dieta Izrael jazyk David Jesus syn Mary. This they disobeyed transgressed
They nie enjoin jeden iny z committing zly! Chudobny indeed je co they robit
Ona see vela z them allying those disbelieve! Chudobny indeed je co ich hands sent forth ich souls. GOD bol angry them consequently they abide forever retribution
Had they verit v GOD prophet v co revealed him tu they nie befriended them. vela z them bol zly
